overview: The only thing that could make Chuck's gorgeous new house even better is when his hot former real estate agent Uma Jolie drops by for a visit as he's relaxing poolside!  Home inspector Mr. Sheen is shocked when the sellers' agent Davina Davis asks him to hide the problems he's found with the house from his clients.  Everything about the house is perfect, so Chuck wants to make an offer right away, and asks realtor Madison Mia to help celebrate with a hot fuck!  This snowbird wants the perfect winter vacation home, and he's prepared to put in an offer above asking as long as his hot real estate agent Jennifer Jacobs will give him a little something in return.
tagline: Home Buying & Rental XXX Tales Involving Tiny Girls
title: Petite Properties 3
